00040 #define MAX_LENOFCID 30
00041 
00043 typedef struct channel_param{
00044   cachemodel_param_t *cachemodel; 
00045   char cid[MAX_LENOFCID];         
00046   cnew_transport_t aux;           
00047   /* - a record of the client's capabilities and preferences to the extent that the server queues requests*/
00048   time_t start_tm;                
00049   struct channel_param *next;     
00050 } channel_param_t;

00056   channel_param_t *last;  
00057 } channellist_param_t;
